entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Halifax
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 06:41 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: SE 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to rain this morning. Rain along the coast this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
